QAPair.Question: What is (are) Foot sprain - aftercare ?
QAPair.Answer: There are many bones and ligaments in your foot. A ligament is a strong flexible tissue that holds bones together. When the foot lands awkwardly, some ligaments can stretch and tear. This is called a sprain . When the injury occurs to the middle part of the foot, this is called a mid-foot sprain.
